member.name: D2D1_SATURATION_PROP
member.summary: Identifiers for properties of the Saturation effect.

summary.para: The saturation of the image. You can set the saturation to a value between 0 and 1. If you set it to 1 the output image is fully saturated. If you set it to 0 the output image is monochrome. The saturation value is unitless.
